page.title: 14Coatestown Cottage (present)
page.content: obert and David Bricklebank Our house is made of gritstone.It has fourteen windows,two doors and a stone slate roof.There are three bedrooms and one bathroom upstairs.My brother and I have our own bedrooms with our own things in and posters all over the walls.For a time we had old stirs that went straight down.Mr Fletcher the joiner in Longnor came and made us some new stairs.They turned at a right angle half way down.Mum and Anne stained and varnished them.Downstairs we have a living room and a kitchen,there is also another bathroom.The kitchen contains a table tht is nearly 90 years old.
